main.name: Manish Sondhi
main.description: I am a Product & UI/UX Designer at CYNC Software
main.bio: Hi there! I am Manish! I'm a passionate Product & UX/UI designer with 5+ years of experience crafting user-centered experiences.  I leverage user research and usability testing to design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for web and mobile applications. Skilled in wireframing, prototyping, and creating UI style guides, I ensure consistent brand experiences across platforms.

education.description: Graduated with a great learning experience in Information Technology
Certified in Foundations of User Experience (UX) Design from Google

work.title: UI/UX Designer
work.description: Led design efforts to improve user experience and engagement for key application functions, including Collateral, Relationship, Stock, and Exposure. Created the field of human-centered design research using usability surveys and in-depth interviews. Promoted cooperative partnerships to align product concepts with corporate goals and user demands. Used Figma and Adobe XD for prototyping, performed extensive user testing, and implemented responsive design concepts for a consistent user experience across various platforms. Experience in developing and maintaining applications using JSX, React.JS, Micro-Frontend, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.JS, React-router, React components, Forms, Events, Keys, Router, Jest, and testing program responsiveness.

work.title: UI/UX Designer
work.description: Proficient in creating rapid prototypes, leading design activities, and facilitating workshops. Gathered user needs, draw wireframes, and guide conversations to develop and validate UI concepts. Used Adobe XD to build high-fidelity prototypes, test them with users, and collaborate with development teams to ensure technical feasibility. Supported the execution of UI concepts and use advanced techniques to boost efficiency. Good understanding in developing applications using Angular 11 and Bootstrap, using Typescript, CSS3, and HTML5. Followed Agile methodologies and have experience in developing style sheets, Angular 11 Template Driven forms, Decorators, Routes, and implementing HTML5 features.

work.title: UI/UX Designer
work.description: Completed various coding courses, passed Adobe XD Essentials test, developed websites using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Visual Studio Code, created responsive mobile and web apps, conducted research, and developed a portfolio and personal website.

skills.name: Prototyping, Wireframing, User Flows, and Mockups

Quote.text: Work harder than the other person in the room no matter how hard it is get the work done and give everything you have in you toward the work you really love.
I’m not a great programmer; I’m just a good programmer with great habits.
Real programmers can write assembly code in any language.
People ignore design that ignores people.
